name: node-django-csrf-support
description: > Set a csrftoken header in AJAX requests using jQuery every time in Django. > Based on the document [csrf in Django](https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/dev/ref/contrib/csrf/). > Only compatible with requirejs right now.
author: Jarvys <yuhan534@126.com> (https://jarvys.github.io/)
